name: Kevin Durant
description: 6'10" forward, most skilled scorer ever at his size. 2 championships, 1 MVP. Silky smooth game, unstoppable length, complicated legacy.

pull-up-jumper.name: Pull-Up Midrange
pull-up-jumper.description: Silky smooth pull-up from midrange - unguardable
pull-up-jumper.prompt: shooting pull-up midrange jumper - silky smooth form, ball releasing from 7-foot release point, impossibly long arms making the shot uncontestable, pure skill

rip-through.name: Rip Through Move
rip-through.expression: clever manipulation, getting to the line
rip-through.prompt: executing rip-through move drawing foul - ball swinging through defender's arms, drawing contact and whistle, the savvy veteran move

dagger-three.name: Dagger Three
dagger-three.prompt: shooting clutch three-pointer with signature leg kick - one leg extended forward on release, perfect form, game on the line, dagger delivered

blocking-shot.name: Weak Side Block
blocking-shot.description: Coming from weak side for monster block
blocking-shot.prompt: blocking shot from weak side - impossibly long arm swatting ball from behind, the length that makes him elite on both ends, two-way dominance

stare-down.name: Silent Stare
stare-down.description: Quiet stare after big moment - no celebration needed
stare-down.prompt: quiet stare at opponent or camera after big basket - no excessive celebration, just confident acknowledgment, letting the work speak, silent assassin

twitter-fingers.name: On His Phone
twitter-fingers.description: The social media presence - always online
twitter-fingers.prompt: looking at phone with slight smirk - the most online superstar, burner accounts, direct engagement with fans and critics, modern athlete
